content: I ran into an issue where my code for part c of the first pset didn't work on my laptop but worked on my friend's laptop. Because I was short on time and needed to submit the pset I submitted the pset assuming that the server won't run into the same issue as my laptop. I received a score of zero on that part though logically and when tracing the code back it makes sense.
subject: PSET 1 runs infinitily on my laptop but fine one someone's laptop

content: What kind of laptop do you have?
If you received a 0 on the pset, a TA will manually regrade it. Your code probably had an infinite loop.
